document_notes.text:
This update for apache2 fixes the following issues:

- fixed CVE-2021-30641 [bsc#1187174]: MergeSlashes regression
- fixed CVE-2020-35452 [bsc#1186922]: Single zero byte stack overflow in mod_auth_digest
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.0 to 2.4.46 A specially crafted Digest nonce can cause a stack overflow in mod_auth_digest. There is no report of this overflow being exploitable, nor the Apache HTTP Server team could create one, though some particular compiler and/or compilation option might make it possible, with limited consequences anyway due to the size (a single byte) and the value (zero byte) of the overflow
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
